response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a price that reflects its true worth while allowing me to earn a fair return. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. I believe this price strikes a balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a high-quality product that meets your expectations. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
